ygData.subject: Re: Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The L24 song also grants ultravision.  I ve found it useful playing it and Accel together (they both have a huge radius of effect) when I m running with
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 3 Feb 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> So I wonder if they will eventually give us a new song to
> replace the level 24 See Invis song? I never even bought
> this song in the first place. Seems to me it is no longer
> required since we can just sing Clouding now.

The L24 song also grants ultravision. I've found it useful
playing it and Accel together (they both have a huge radius of
effect) when I'm running with blind humans at night.

Course the L25 song grants infravision...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
